name: Water Weird
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.Invisible in Water: The water weird is invisible while fully immersed in water.
traits.Water Bound: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

actions.Constrict: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13+1d4 + 11) and pulled 5 feet toward the water weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the water weird tries to drown it, and the water weird can't constrict another target.
